city.name: new-york-city
city.description: Iconic Landmarks: NYC is home to world-famous landmarks like the Statue of Liberty, Times Square, Central Park, the Empire State Building, and the Brooklyn Bridge. Cultural Diversity: It's a melting pot of cultures, offering a diverse array of cuisines, languages, and experiences from around the globe. Arts and Entertainment: From Broadway shows to off-Broadway theaters, museums like the Metropolitan Museum of Art and the Museum of Modern Art, and music venues catering to every taste, NYC is a cultural hub. Shopping: From luxury boutiques on Fifth Avenue to eclectic shops in neighborhoods like SoHo and Greenwich Village, NYC is a shopper's paradise. Dining Scene: With thousands of restaurants serving cuisine from every corner of the world, NYC offers unparalleled dining experiences.

favouriteSubjects.description_1: I love this subject becouse it helps me understand different tools to work remote and how to commuicate with other colegues in different location.
favouriteSubjects.description_2: Because it allows me to understand both front-end and back-end aspects of web development, giving me a comprehensive skill set to build dynamic and interactive web applications.
favouriteSubjects.description_3: It equips me with the knowledge and skills needed to navigate the intersection of engineering and business in an era characterized by rapid technological advancements.
